card.name: Venom
card.property: You can control 1 additional upgrade that has the restricted keyword. Symbiotic Bond - Resource: Take 1 damage â†’ generate a [wild] resource. (Limit once per phase)

alternate.name: Flash Thompson
alternate.property: You can control 1 additional upgrade that has the restricted keyword. Armed and Ready - Setup: Discard cards from the top of your deck until you discard a [[weapon]] upgrade, then add that card to your hand.

card.name: Behind Enemy Lines
card.property: Hero Action: (thwart): Remove 3 threat from a scheme. If you paid for this card using only [mental] resources, confuse an enemy.
"Yes, sir I understand. Country first.!" - Venom

card.name: Grasping Tendrils
card.property: Hero Interrupt (defense): When the villain initiates an attack against you, cancel that attack. If you paid for this card using only [physical] resources, stun the villain.

card.name: Locked and Loaded
card.property: Action Search your deck for a [[weapon]] upgrade and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
"I've been looking forward to this!." - Venom

card.name: Run and Gun
card.property: Hero Action: Ready Venom and each [[weapon]] upgrade you control.

card.name: Savage Attack
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Deal 5 damage to an enemy. If you paid for this card using only [energy] resources, this attack gains overkill.

card.name: Project Rebirth 2.0
card.property: Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Project Rebirth 2.0 â†’ choose to either draw 1 card or heal 3 damage from Flash Thompson.
"The U.S. government's second super-soldier project, binding symbiotes to talented veterans." - Drax

card.name: Multi-Gun
card.property: Restricted. Hero Action: Exhaust Multi-Gun â†’ choose one of the following: Deal 2 damage to an enemy Choose a player. Deal 1 damage to each minion engaged with that player. Remove 2 threat from a scheme.

card.name: Spider-Sense
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When the villain initiates an attack agaist you, draw 1 card.

card.name: Venom's Pistol
card.property: Restricted. Hero Interrupt: When you use one of Venom's basic powers, exhaust Venom's Pistol â†’ Venom gets +1 to that power for this use.

card.name: Jack Flag
card.property: Response: After Jack Flag thwarts, place 1 ammo counter on him. Hero Action: Exhaust Jack Flag and remove 1 ammo counter from him â†’ deal 2 damage to an enemy.

card.name: Scare Tactic
card.property: Hero Action: (attack): Deal 3 damage to a confused enemy.

card.name: Making an Entrance
card.property: Hero Interrupt: When your hero makes a basic thwart, it gets +2 THW for that thwart. After that thwart ends, if your hero removed all threat from a scheme that way, heal 2 damage from your hero.

card.name: Sonic Rifle
card.property: Restricted. Uses (2 charge counters). Hero Action: Exhaust Sonic Rifle and remove 1 charge counter from it â†’ confuse an enemy (deal 3 damage to that enemy instead if it is already confused).

card.name: Star-Lord
card.property: * Star-Lords attacks gain ranged. Forced Response: After Star-Lord enters play under your control, deal yourself 1 facedown encounter card.
Gotta risk it to get the biscuit.

card.name: Side Holster
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. You can control 1 additional [[weapon]] upgrade that has the restricted keyword.

card.name: Plasma Pistol
card.property: Restricted. Uses (3 charge counters). Hero Action: Exhaust Plasma Pistol and remove 1 charge counter from it â†’ deal 1 damage to an enemy.

card.name: "Fusillade"
card.property: Hero Action (attack): Exhaust a [[weapon]] upgrade you control â†’ deal 5 damage to an enemy.
"Give me something to shoot."

card.name: "Welcome Aboard"
card.property: Play only if your identity has the [[guardian]] trait. Max 1 per round. Hero Action: Reduce the resource cost of the next ally played this phase by 2.
"Guardians gather? Group up? Man, I don't know." - Peter Quill

card.name: Shake it Off
card.property: Hero Response: After a [[guardian]] character takes any amount of damage from an attack, give that character a tough status card.
"Groot, buddy, I get that you can regrow and all but you've gotta be more careful." - Rocket Raccoon

card.name: Crew Quarters
card.property: Play under any player's control. Max 1 per player. Alter-Ego Action: Exhaust Crew Quarters â†’ heal 1 damage from an alter-ego.

card.name: Struggle for Control
card.property: Give to the Flash Thompson player. You may flip to your alter-ego form. Choose: - Exhaust Flash Thompson and take 2 damage â†’ discard this obligation. - Put 1 set-aside copy of Enraged Symbiote into play engaged with the first player. If you cannot, this card gains surge. Discard this obligation.

card.name: Klyntar Frenzy
card.property: Threat cannot be removed from this scheme while a [[Symbiote]] enemy is in play.
The Venom symbiote is distraught, bonding with everyone it touches and sending them into a destructive rage.

card.name: Enraged Symbiote
card.property: Guard. Patrol. (While this minion is engaged with you, you cannot thwart the main scheme.) (Venom's nemesis minion.) Put Enraged Symbiote into play engaged with you.
"You will kneel before the true Destroyer!"
